definitions.definition: A beginner ; a person who is new to a subject, skill, or belief.
A novice (recent convert); a new convert or proselyte ; a new monk .

Among the early Christians, and still among the Roman Catholics , one who has recently embraced the Christian faith, and been admitted to baptism, especially those converts from heathenism or Judaism .
A plant species recently introduced to an area (in contrast to archaeophyte , a long-established introduced species).

main_definition: A beginner ; a person who is new to a subject, skill, or belief.
secondary_definitions: A novice (recent convert); a new convert or proselyte ; a new monk .

( Christianity ) Among the early Christians, and still among the Roman Catholics , one who has recently embraced the Christian faith, and been admitted to baptism, especially those converts from heathenism or Judaism .
( botany ) A plant species recently introduced to an area (in contrast to archaeophyte , a long-established introduced species).
